data.prayer: Please, teach the 52,767 believers in Sancti Spíritus, Cuba how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sancti Spíritus, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Sancti Spíritus, Cuba.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Sancti Spíritus, Cuba to the gospel today.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Sancti Spíritus, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Trinidad
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Trinidad, Sancti Spíritus, Cuba.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Sancti Spíritus
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Sancti Spíritus, Cuba to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sancti Spíritus, Cuba has a population of 465,500.

We estimate Sancti Spíritus has 52,767 people who might know Jesus, 208,899 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 203,834 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 52,767 believers in Sancti Spíritus, Cuba.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
